sense.def:
Duty
je delo, ki ga moramo opraviti v službi.

seg.quote: He reported for duty at the manager's office.

sense.def:
Kadar so policisti, zdravniki ali medicinske sestre
on duty
, to pomeni, da delajo. Kadar pa so
off duty
, ne delajo.

seg.quote: A police constable on duty became suspicious.
You can go off duty now.

sense.def:
One's duties
so naloge, ki jih opravljamo kot del svoje službe.

seg.quote: A young woman was going to give instruction in her duties.

sense.def:
Če za nekaj rečemo, da je tisto
our duty
, hočemo povedati, da nekaj moramo storiti, ker smo za tisto odgovorni.

seg.quote: As a doctor, it was my duty to preserve life.

sense.def:
Duties
so dajatve, ki jih plačamo vladi na dobrine, ki jih kupimo.

seg.quote: The government increased the duty on petrol.
